channel.title: dublin on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan
channel.description: Recent content in dublin on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: on an irish pilgrimage…
item.description: the next 10 days we are taking part in a spiritual journey through ireland. really kind of a pilgrimage, a christian pilgrimage to be precise, by bus (not a lot of walking involved, unfortunately) to the places of the old, celtic irish church. the whole trip has been organized by the akademie st. paul — and it’s the first group trip of this kind that i’ve ever participated in and i’m not too sure whether it’s going to be to my liking.
